# nowPlayingInfoCenter

**Instance Property**

The Now Playing information center associated with the session.

## Declaration

```swift
var nowPlayingInfoCenter: MPNowPlayingInfoCenter { get }
```

## Configuring Now Playing information

- **automaticallyPublishesNowPlayingInfo**: A Boolean that indicates whether Now Playing info automatically publishes.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether Now Playing info automatically publishes.
